name: The Heptagoonies
description:
Made for Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1 in one week.

Theme: Stronger Together.

Assets (not Square and Triangle): Medieval pixel art asset FREE by Blackspire.

---------------------------------

A puzzle-platformer with 3 levels where you get to do teamwork between a Square and a Triangle that have different abilities (best buddies, very EPIC).

If you like (or not) this game please comment what you think about the game.
